description: Numerator of the x-coordinate of the 3rd point (x,y) of the n-th triangle with integer sides in the list given by A316841, when the triangle is drawn with the longest side from (0,0) to (0,A316843(n)) and the middle side A316844(n) from (0,A316843(n)) to (x,y). x = a(n)/A331696(n), y = sqrt(A331697(n))/A331696(n).
